description:
The file "table.csv" contains the following comma-separated lines:
id,name,count
4,susan,11
33,alice,22
1772,joe,33

Print the rows as a table, like the following:
id    name   count
4     susan  11
33    alice  22
1772  joe    33
author: cmdchallenge
disp_title: Displaying a table from a csv
